A floating solar farm that uses water to cool the panels and create hydroelectricity.
A wind turbine that uses artificial intelligence to optimize its performance based on weather patterns and local conditions.
A biomass power plant that converts organic waste into biofuels and electricity.
A geothermal power plant that uses heat from deep within the earth to generate electricity.
A tidal power plant that harnesses the kinetic energy of ocean tides to generate electricity.
